text.div: CapabilityStatement for Client Actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement FooBar The IHE Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

name: IHE_FooBar_client
title: IHE FooBar client
description: CapabilityStatement for Client Actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement IHE FooBar. See https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/TF/Volume1/ch-38.html. The IHE Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

rest.documentation: FooBar client will query for Patient resources matching a sub-set of the FHIR core Patient resource query parameters

security.description: None mandated by IHE, encouraged IHE-IUA or SMART-on-FHIR

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Whether the patient record is active

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-country
searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient

searchParam.name: _lastUpdated
searchParam.documentation: When the resource version last changed
